meanings.definition: A large particle accelerator used to collide beams of particles at high energies.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the effects of collisions in supercolliders to learn more about particles.
meanings.sent2: The supercolliders at the research facility are crucial for advancing our understanding of physics.
meanings.sent3: When the supercolliders threw a particle party, all the atoms showed up!
meanings.sent4: The supercolliders are like giant magnifying glasses revealing the secrets of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The supercolliders hummed with energy as particles raced towards each other.

meanings.definition: A facility designed to accelerate and collide particles at high speeds for scientific research.
meanings.sent1: The supercolliders in the lab are where scientists conduct groundbreaking experiments.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use supercolliders to create high-speed collisions for their studies.
meanings.sent3: The supercolliders decided to throw a surprise collision party for the scientists.
meanings.sent4: In the world of science, supercolliders are the ultimate playground for particles.
meanings.sent5: The supercolliders roared to life, ready to unlock the mysteries of the universe.
